page.title: 09 CRABHILL HOUSE
page.content: {Crabhill House}is a hoilday home for disabled people.It costs{Â£400}for two weeks.{Â£100}is given by the {Winged Fellowship Trust}who own {Crabhill House.}It was bought{22 years ago by{Joan Brander.}There are facilities for{32}disabled people Each disabled person has a person who looks after them,these people are{volunteers and{don't}get paid. About{Â£60,000 are raised a year. There are{12 members of staff{3}of whom are nurses. {Crabhill House}is closed from Christmas to March.Sometimes famous people visit the house like{Phil {Collins.}The main reason for{Crabhill {House}is to give the people who normally look after the disabled person a rest as well as the disabled person.
